Class JsonParser

java.lang.Object
app.utils.JsonParser
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class JsonParser extends Object implements GetFile
Class for parsing json files into collections and vice versa

      Method for parsing a json string into a collection

      json - String Json string
      Returns:
      CollectionManager Collection manager that manages the collection stored in json string
      Throws:
      CannotInitializeCollectionException - Thrown when the collection can't be initialized

      Parameters:
      collection - Vector<Person> The collection
      Returns:
      String The resulting string
      Throws:
      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException - Thrown when the collection can't be processed into json

    • writeStringToFile

      public String writeStringToFile(String filename, String defaultName, String s) throws NoFileException
      Method for writing a string to a file
      Parameters:
      filename - The filepath
      defaultName - The default filepath in case the first one doesn't result in a writable file
      s - String The string
      Returns:
      String The absolute path of the file the string has been written into
      Throws:
      NoFileException - Thrown when neither the first nor the second filepath result in a writable file

      filename - String The filepath
